resources.string: RuntimePermissionsExtended
Request
Application needs CAMERA_PERMISSION in order to capture image. Please allow permission.
Please enable CAMERA_PERMISSION. Go to \nSettings -> Apps -> Permission
Application needs READ_CALENDAR_PERMISSION in order access calendar. Please allow permission.
Please enable READ_CALENDAR_PERMISSION. Go to \nSettings -> Apps -> Permissions
Application needs WRITE_CALENDAR_PERMISSION in order access calendar. Please allow permission.
Please enable WRITE_CALENDAR_PERMISSION. Go to \nSettings -> Apps -> Permissions
Application needs WRITE_CONTACTS_PERMISSION in order access contacts. Please allow permission.
Please enable WRITE_CONTACTS_PERMISSION. Go to \nSettings -> Apps -> Permissions
Application needs READ_CONTACTS_PERMISSION in order access contacts. Please allow permission.
Please enable READ_CONTACTS_PERMISSION. Go to \nSettings -> Apps -> Permissions
Application needs GET_ACCOUNTS_PERMISSION in order access your accounts. Please allow permission.
Please enable GET_ACCOUNTS_PERMISSION. Go to \nSettings -> Apps -> Permissions
Application needs ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION_PERMISSION in order to access your location. Please allow permission.
Please enable ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION_PERMISSION. Go to \nSettings -> Apps -> Permissions
Application needs ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION_PERMISSION in order access your location. Please allow permission.
Please enable ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION_PERMISSION. Go to \nSettings -> Apps -> Permissions
Application needs RECORD_AUDIO_PERMISSION in order to use microphone. Please allow permission.
Please enable RECORD_AUDIO_PERMISSION. Go to \nSettings -> Apps -> Permissions
Application needs READ_PHONE_STATE_PERMISSION in order to access phone state. Please allow permission.
Please enable READ_PHONE_STATE_PERMISSION. Go to \nSettings -> Apps -> Permissions
Application needs CALL_PHONE_PERMISSION in order to make a call. Please allow permission.
Please enable CALL_PHONE_PERMISSION. Go to \nSettings -> Apps -> Permissions
Application needs READ_CALL_LOG_PERMISSION in order to read call log. Please allow permission.
Please enable READ_CALL_LOG_PERMISSION. Go to \nSettings -> Apps -> Permissions
Application needs WRITE_CALL_LOG_PERMISSION in order to write into call log. Please allow permission.
Please enable WRITE_CALL_LOG_PERMISSION. Go to \nSettings -> Apps -> Permissions
Application needs ADD_VOICEMAIL_PERMISSION in order to add voicemail. Please allow permission.
Please enable ADD_VOICEMAIL_PERMISSION. Go to \nSettings -> Apps -> Permissions
Application needs USE_SIP_PERMISSION in order to use SIP. Please allow permission.
Please enable USE_SIP_PERMISSION. Go to \nSettings -> Apps -> Permissions
Application needs PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALLS_PERMISSION in order to process outgoing calls. Please allow permission.
Please enable PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALLS_PERMISSION. Go to \nSettings -> Apps -> Permissions
Application needs BODY_SENSORS_PERMISSION in order to use body sensor. Please allow permission.
Please enable BODY_SENSORS_PERMISSION. Go to \nSettings -> Apps -> Permission
Application needs SEND_SMS_PERMISSION in order to send SMS. Please allow permission.
Please enable SEND_SMS_PERMISSION. Go to \nSettings -> Apps -> Permission
Application needs RECEIVE_SMS_PERMISSION in order to receive SMS. Please allow permission.
Please enable RECEIVE_SMS_PERMISSION. Go to \nSettings -> Apps -> Permission
Application needs RECEIVE_MMS_PERMISSION in order to receive MMS. Please allow permission.
Please enable RECEIVE_MMS_PERMISSION. Go to \nSettings -> Apps -> Permission
Application needs READ_SMS_PERMISSION in order to read SMS. Please allow permission.
Please enable READ_SMS_PERMISSION. Go to \nSettings -> Apps -> Permission
Application needs RECEIVE_WAP_PUSH_PERMISSION in order to receive WAP SMS. Please allow permission.
Please enable RECEIVE_WAP_PUSH_PERMISSION. Go to \nSettings -> Apps -> Permission
Application needs READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE_PERMISSION in order to read from disk memory. Please allow permission.
Please enable READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE_PERMISSION. Go to \nSettings -> Apps -> Permission
Application needs WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE_PERMISSION in order to write into disk memory. Please allow permission.
Please enable WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE_PERMISSION. Go to \nSettings -> Apps -> Permission
